_dagger_ +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d4+10 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_harrow card_ +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 3d4+10 slashing plus 3d6 force

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 36
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Summon Fey](/Spells.aspx?ID=322), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Circle of Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=38), [Invisibility Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=165), [Nondetection](/Spells.aspx?ID=209) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [Telepathy](/Spells.aspx?ID=337) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Banishment](/Spells.aspx?ID=19), [Shadow Siphon](/Spells.aspx?ID=274), [Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=327) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43), [Spellwrack](/Spells.aspx?ID=298), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (3 slots)
- **7th**
[Dimensional Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=71), [Prismatic Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), [Project Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=237) (3 slots)
- **8th**
[Scintillating Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=267), [Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=347) (2 slots)

**Control Harrow Cards**   Lantondo can Strike with any of their harrow cards as long as they can see their target. When Lantondo Strikes with a harrow card, they can leave the card on any surface in the target's space or return the card to their deck at the end of the action.

</column>
